casebody.data:
SULLIVAN
v.
MASSINGILL, et al. No. 360P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Robert B. Jones, Jr., John D. Martin, Wilmington, for George Fletcher, et al. James K. Pendergrass, Jr., for Walter Massingill, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of September 2005 by Plaintiff for Reconsideration:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
